name: Legend Builder Network
description:
One part table top RPG manual, one part text adventure and one part important work job. Legend Builder Network was created for the 2-Buttons Jam 2020.  LBN Laboratories has hired you to design genetically-engineered adventurers to complete quests for their clientele. Make your design choices wisely. Do not discuss company details outside of work and collect your paycheck every other Friday. 

CONTROLS: 

"S" = Select

"Enter" = Confirm / Next Menu
